title: Base120 Failure Modes Registry
description: Registered failure modes (FM1-FM30) for artifact validation. Version 1.0.0 - FROZEN.

FM1.name: MISSING_REQUIRED_FIELD
FM1.description: A required field is missing from the artifact

FM2.name: INVALID_FIELD_TYPE
FM2.description: A field has an incorrect data type

FM3.name: INVALID_ID_FORMAT
FM3.description: Artifact ID does not match required pattern

FM4.name: INVALID_MODEL_REFERENCE
FM4.description: Model ID does not match valid Base120 model pattern

FM5.name: INVALID_TRANSFORMATION_CODE
FM5.description: Transformation code is not one of: P, IN, CO, DE, RE, SY

FM6.name: MODEL_TRANSFORMATION_MISMATCH
FM6.description: Model ID prefix does not match declared transformation

FM7.name: EMPTY_MODELS_ARRAY
FM7.description: Models array must contain at least one model

FM8.name: DUPLICATE_MODEL_REFERENCE
FM8.description: Same model referenced multiple times in artifact

FM9.name: INVALID_WEIGHT_RANGE
FM9.description: Model weight must be between 0 and 1

FM10.name: INVALID_TIMESTAMP_FORMAT
FM10.description: Timestamp does not conform to ISO 8601 format

FM11.name: UNEXPECTED_FIELD
FM11.description: Artifact contains field not defined in schema

FM12.name: SCHEMA_VERSION_MISMATCH
FM12.description: Artifact schema version does not match validator

FM14.name: INVALID_DOMAIN_VALUE
FM14.description: Domain value not in recommended domain list

FM15.name: INVALID_CLASS_VALUE
FM15.description: Class value not in recommended class list

FM16.name: NORMALIZATION_FAILURE
FM16.description: Artifact could not be normalized deterministically

FM17.name: HASH_MISMATCH
FM17.description: Artifact hash does not match declared SHA-256

FM19.name: MRCC_INVALID
FM19.description: MRCC does not conform to v1.0 structure

FM24.name: INSUFFICIENT_COVERAGE
FM24.description: Artifact does not cover minimum transformation types

FM29.name: RESERVED_FIELD_USED
FM29.description: Artifact uses a reserved field name
